meanings.definition: The act of amassing or gathering a large quantity of something.
meanings.sent1: Her amassment of toys filled the entire room.
meanings.sent2: The amassment of books in the library was impressive.
meanings.sent3: His amassment of candy made him the most popular kid in school.
meanings.sent4: The amassment of knowledge in his mind was like a treasure trove.
meanings.sent5: The amassment of clouds signaled an impending storm.

meanings.definition: A large collection or accumulation of something.
meanings.sent1: The amassment of coins in the jar was a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent2: The amassment of seashells on the beach was beautiful.
meanings.sent3: The amassment of socks in her drawer was comically chaotic.
meanings.sent4: The amassment of stars in the night sky was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The amassment of colors in the painting created a vibrant masterpiece.
